Monsters.Name: Slime
Monsters.Lore: A amalgamation of sludge, given life my magic causing it to become semi-transparent and colored. Its mezmerizing form often can lure in children for it to eat; however, adults find themselves soothed by its movements.

Monsters.Name: Ugly Goblin
Monsters.Lore: Unlike normal goblins, this one is exceptionally ugly. So ugly in fact that not even the goblins wanted to keep them around. Cast out from their tribe and hungry this goblin is by far the weakest of its breathern.

Monsters.Name: Fluffy Cloud
Monsters.Lore: Fluffy Clouds are dangerous predators that disguise themselves as harmless gas. Once a target has been chosen they dissolve it in water and then evaporate the remains: consuming the produced vapor as food.

Monsters.Name: Nimble Crow
Monsters.Lore: These crows soar from above the clouds at blinding speeds! Watch out, crows can be incredibly agile and have an unusual appetite for anything that resembles grapes, including eyes!

Monsters.Name: Mega Slime
Monsters.Lore: Legend says there was once a mighty slime. A slime so terrible and ruthless it would eat entire towns. Many homes and people have been eaten by such a foul creature. It nows stands before you as the Mega Slime! Take heed, for it wiggle towards thee!

Monsters.Name: Baby Croc
Monsters.Lore: These  Baby Cros have quite the strong jaw! With their mighty chomp they can hold onto any object for hours at a time. Despite their cruel nature, they are almost cute.

Monsters.Name: Swamp Flan
Monsters.Lore: A wondrous desert flan, imbued with magic and dropped into a deep and dirty swamp. These flans distinguish themselve from their slime brethern with their intense magical prowess.

Monsters.Name: Treent
Monsters.Lore: Do not be fooled by it's willow-ish nature. These seemingly docile creature will unleash a flurry of whips upon any foolish creature that approaches it.

Monsters.Name: Goblin
Monsters.Lore: A true goblin. Not as hideous as some goblins, but they are quite ugly nonetheless.

Monsters.Name: Wolf
Monsters.Lore: Wolves are said to rule this plain. Their incredible speed and sharp fangs make them foes not to be underestimated.

Monsters.Name: Large Bumbler
Monsters.Lore: The Large Bumbler is said to be an amalgamation of queens bees. They often smells of honey and lure in young cubs.

Monsters.Name: Zombie
Monsters.Lore: This undead flesh roams the earth with a vengeance. It mostly moans but loves the taste of brains.

Monsters.Name: Skeleton
Monsters.Lore: While the skeleton may be brittle, it's brutal undead strength can easily fell the strongest of foes.

Monsters.Name: Mage Skeleton
Monsters.Lore: This undead bretheren of the skeleton was once a magic user. It's spell have transcended the land of the living and now cause havoc in the realms of the beyond.

Monsters.Name: Direwolf
Monsters.Lore: This aint just any wolf, it's dire, baby.

Monsters.Name: Warg
Monsters.Lore: The magical version of a Direwolf, this creature does not fear anyone.

Monsters.Name: Storm Cloud
Monsters.Lore: These clouds only come out during the stormiest of nights. Their incredible electric powers are not to be ignored. They are said to light up the sky with their fury.

Monsters.Name: Baby Dragon
Monsters.Lore: Though this creatures may look cute and endearing, do not be fooled! It is yet a dragon. And where their are kin there are surely...

Monsters.Name: Goblin Lord
Monsters.Lore: This is of the highest elites of the Goblins hierarchy. Their gilded armor reflects the the spoils of the level of knights they have slain.
